name: Stalker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack
display_help: Kinetic Melee features a mix of fast light attacks and slow heavy attacks, including some with range. All attacks in this set except Assassin's Strike reduce the damage strength of enemies who are hit.

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Quick_Strike
powers.display_help: A quick attack that sometimes knock foes down. Fast, but low damage. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast

powers.display_help: Smashing Blow is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a good amount of damage. Has a greater chance to stun than body blow. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Assassins_Strike
powers.display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior energy and smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Placate
powers.display_help: Allows you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassins Strike. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 15000.00% stealth radius for 10s on self after 0.25s delay
38000.00% stealth radius for 10s on self after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Burst
powers.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be knocked down as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockdown

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Total_Focus
powers.display_help: Concentrated Strike is a slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Concentrated Strike, its recharge time is very long. Concentrated Strike Criticals do not result in extra damage, instead they instantly recharge the Build Up power. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
